q: RIM and HP/Palm need not apply in Stephen Elop 's eyes. And we of course can't have such a big announcement coming from the Microsoft camp without having a statement from Steve Ballmer . I am excited about this partnership with Nokia, added Steve Ballmer . ''Ecosystems thrive when fueled by speed, innovation and scale. The partnership announced today provides incredible scale, vast expertise in hardware and software innovation and a proven ability to execute.''

engineering and online experience to help build its presence in the nascent cloud computing market. Startup Virtual Iron has a maturing virtual server technology that is making inroads with customers and providing a challenge to VMWare. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia

0 comments POSTED: Friday, Feb. 04, 2011 NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. ''I want to make sure that he doesn't put himself in a position where he's going to make bad decisions or bad things can happen around him,'' Roger Goodell said.
